{"id":984229198,"question_id":2868,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"11 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1688269626,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/984229198/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Continuous Subarrays","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public long continuousSubarrays(int[] nums) {\n        int len = nums.length;\n        \n        long res = 0L;\n        \n        int st = 0; \n        \n        \n        \n        for(int ed =0; ed<len; ed++){\n            \n            if(ed-st>0 && Math.abs(nums[ed]-nums[ed-1])>2){\n                int width = ed-st;\n            \n                res = (res + (1+width)*width/2);\n            \n                st=ed;\n            }\n            \n            \n        }\n    \n        return res;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"continuous-subarrays","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
